commits.message: replaced Long ids by GradoopId in org.gradoop.model.*, #99
continued replacing Long ids by GradoopId, #99
continued replacing Long ids by -> compiles now, #99
continued replacing Long ids by -> checkstyle & findbugs ok, #99
continued replacing Long ids by -> tests either run or issues are created, #99
started test examples for ascii reader, #102
updated ascii graph loader and one sample test, #102
added ascii graph loader and documentation, #102
collection equality by graph id and element ids, #102
fix in ASCIIGraphLoader, #102          * replaced containsAll with containsAny
too few memory segments error workaround, #102
EqualityByGraphElementIds added, new equality package structure, #102
added tests for GradoopId and GradoopIds, #99
added new GradoopId, #99          * renamed GradoopIds to GradoopIdSet     * GradoopIds is now a util class which is currently a workaround
implemented collection equality by graph data, #102
implemented graph equality by element ids, #102
no errors after Gradoop ID refactoring, #102
Add append method to [Flink]AsciiGraphLoader, #102          * fixed checkstyle errors in AsciiGraphLoader
equals methods added tp graph collection, #102
logical graph head migrated to 1-element dataset, #102
logical graph head migrated to 1-element dataset, #102
logical graph head migrated to 1-element dataset, #102
logical graph head migrated to 1-element dataset, #102
removed Vertex from source and target class and method names, #102
removed dependency to MultipleProgramsTestBase, #102          * added gradoop-algorithms and moved btg, lp there
GDL like toString methods for pojos, #102
implemented Property and PropertyValue, #113          * added tests for both     * deserialization of DateTime fails because of wrong ISOCHRONOLOGY
removed property interfaces, #113          * added serialization tests in gradoop-flink
replaced internal UUID with two longs because of Flink bug, #99          * https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/FLINK-3088
fixed equals and hashCode in GradoopIdSet, #99
summarization now uses PropertyValue, #108          * summarization tests fixed     * forward fields need to be set
fixed equality operators to support empty graphs or collections  #102
Equality test for empty edge sets, #102
fixed containment bug in AsciiGraphLoader, #102          * existing vertices/edges were not added to a new graph
fixed Exclusion, #102          * edges were not correctly assigned if source or target was in excluded graph
ascii loaders are now using streams, #102          * fixes mvn clean install issue (read from jar file)
added GradoopStoreConfig to wrap Persistent factories, #102
refactored selection into own package, #102          * removed unnecessary Exceptions in GraphCollection
made reduce operators accessible in GraphCollection, #54
refactored Label Propagation fixes #106          * Label Propagation now uses PropertyValue as label value     * Label Propagation is now a UnaryGraphToGraphOperator
fixed new signature of ForkableFlinkMiniCluster constructor, #102
fixed equality operator bugs for false positive results in the case of an empty first collection, #102
removed btg computation from this branch, #102
fixed checkstyle errors in labelpropagation package          *removed LabelPropagationAlgorithm     *added package info

updated pom files and license information, fixes #118, #126          * added scm and licence information     * added distribution management information     * changed student developer email information     * removed top-dir path     * removed assembly plugin in all modules     * renamed groupId in modules -> org.gradoop     * removed unnecessary dependencies     * enforced license header via checkstyle     * fixed license headers
minor checkstyle fixes, #118          * fixed license headers
minor checkstyle fixes, #101          * fixed license headers
modified CountAggregator, #101          * extends SumAggregator to be combinable     * fixed NPE when calling LogicalGraph.summarize
build EdgeGroupItem before join, #101          * reduced network I/O by 50%
GradoopId implements NormalizableKey, #123          * renamed summarization strategy, #101
added social network example          * removed scope provided from hbase dependency     * added maven-shade as plugin (used in examples)
Projection creates new elements, fixes #134          * added interface BinaryFunction, implemented by ProjectionFunction     * changed ProjectionTest accordingly
Merge pull request #138 from dbs-leipzig/#134_projection_new_elements          Projection creates new elements instead of modifying existing, fixes #134

added ReducibleBinaryGraphToGraphOperator, fixes #136          * added interface     * merged binary ops and their collection implementations     * merged according tests     * removed some redundancy

added ApplicableUnaryGraphToGraphOperator, fixes #137          * added CollectionAggregation operator     * added interfaces CollectionAggregateFunction     * updated vertex count / edge count for collections
encapsulated applicable and reducible operators, fixes #139
added extended social network example          * fixed bug in GradoopId NormalizableKey implementation     * added property getter function     * added jettison dependency (1.3.7)
[minor] updated social network example 2          * added projection step in sna2
added Modification, fixes #141          * added interface ModificationFunction     * implemented operator     * added convenience methods     * added tests on identity and data
added ApplyModification, fixes #144          * implemented operator as children of Modification     * aligned tests for both operators
[minor] updated sna example, added gelly LP
renamed summarization to grouping, fixes #147          * updated operator table in README
added Flink FieldAnnotations, fixes #146          * added ReadFields and ForwardedField annotations     * some data reduction in Split operator
ITBDA example, fixes #152, fixes #153          * Aggregate functions result into property value
updated data type in grouping tests, fixes #156          * fixed Property.toString for null properties
[hotfix] fixed path names in sna example

added support for importing graphs, fixes #127          * external vertex/edge identifiers are generic (comparable)     * external graphs can be read into EPGMDatabase     * storing lineage info (original identifiers) is optional
added convenience methods for transformation, fixes #160          * LogicalGraph.transform[GraphHead|Vertices|Edges](...)     * added LogicalGraph.equalsByData() and updated transformation tests
Graph.fromCollection(v, e) creates new graph head, fixes #132          * the graph ids of the vertices and edges are updated via two map operations.          Fixes #132.
Added sum,min,max aggregation for vertex and edge values, fixes #133
Add support for multiple aggregate functions in grouping          * aggregate properties are managed using PropertyValueList, which is analogous to grouping properties          Fixes #128
Merge pull request #163 from dbs-leipzig/#128_multiple_aggregates          Add support for multiple aggregate functions in grouping
added equality operator for undirected graphs, solves #170
Merge pull request #172 from dbs-leipzig/#170_undirected_equality          added equality operator for undirected graphs, solves #170

Changed ApplyAggregation to use a left outer join, fixes #158.          This makes the aggregation of empty graphs (without vertices and/or edges) possible. It is now necessary to provide a default property value for these graphs.
Merge pull request #164 from dbs-leipzig/#158_aggregation_empty_graphs          #158 ApplyAggregation does not return any value for LogicalGraphs without vertices

Implemented operator ApplySubgraph, #161 (#169)          Created class ApplySubgraph that implements ApplicableUnaryGraphToGraphOperator. Through this, the subgraph operator is now applicable to GraphCollections.          Implemented various functions in package org.gradoop.model.impl.operators.subgraph.functions used by ApplySubgraph.          Moved ElementIdUpdater to org.gradoop.model.impl.functions.epgm because its now used outside of cloning.          Added Value0Of4 function.          Changed ExpandGradoopIds to be applicable to any Tuple2 containing a GradoopIdSet in its second field. Also added documentation and function annotations.
Refactored SpĺitTest. Fixes #178. (#179)          Added test for result with only one graph. Renamed TestHelperFunction to SelectKeyValues.

#171 Add Dual Simulation Implementation (#181)          * implemented vertex-centric dual simulation     * added delta iteration kernel for dual simulation     * improved debug logging and testing     * fixed checkstyle     * updated Simulation Runner     * disabled logging for gradoop-examples     * added AbstractRunner for reading/writing graphs          * added support for single vertex patterns, #171          * optimized preprocessing, #171          * replaced pojos with tuples (ids + query candidates)          * optimized preprocessing, #171          * replaced flatMap with filter + map          * disabled debug logging in tests, #171
added transactional representation of graph collections, fixes #182 (#183)

Encapsulated inner and anonymous function classes. Fixes #149. (#186)          Created multiple new classes for former inner and anonymous classes in the BinaryCollectionToCollectionOperatorBase, the SetOperatorBase and instances of BinaryCollectionToCollectionOperator (Difference, Intersection).

added subgraph isomorphism implementation (fixes #180)          Added exploration (traversal) based subgraph detection based on a GDL query pattern.          * Added Traversal class hierarchy and (default) DFS Traverser     * Implemented pre-processing for traversal     * Implemented (bulk) iteration kernel     * Implemented post-processing     * DualSimulation now implements `UnaryGraphToCollectionOperator`     * `LogicalGraph.match()` calls `ExplorationBasedSubgraphIsomorphism`     * Added parameterized tests for Simulation and Subgraph Isomorphism     * Added visualized test data in dev-support     * Generalized SimulationRunner to PatternMatchingRunner     * Replaced List<Long> with boolean[] for query candidates at vertices and edges
[docs] added further info to README, fixes #188

Predictable transactional data generator, fixes #167 (#191)          * added interfaces for graph transactions          * predictable transaction generator, fixes #167          * fixed missed replacements of DataSet<GraphTransaction> by GraphTransactions, #167
created interfaces for data sources and sinks, fixes #195
refactored JSON IO to new interfaces, fixes #196 (#199)
refactored HBase IO to new interfaces, fixes #197 (#200)
refactored Graph IO to new interfaces, fixes #198 (#201)
Merge pull request #202 from dbs-leipzig/#195_io_interfaces          #195,#196,#197,#198 IO refactoring
File not found exception, fixes #184 (#207)          * Update CategoryCharacteristicPatterns.java     * Update SNABenchmark2.java

fixed transaction transformation, fixes #208          The toTransaction() method is realized by unifying     the vertices and edges in a dataset of EPGMElement.     After that, a groupFunction builds the transaction     graph for the EPGMElements and the GraphHead that     belong to the same graph.
Decoding PropertyValue before comparison, fixes #210 (#218)          * extended unit tests for ordinal, null and boolean types
Set lineSeparator for NewlineAtEndOfFile, fixes #205 (#219)          * set line separator to unix style ("lf")
unit test for gSpan transaction encoder (fixes #226, #229)          * fixed FSM related class cast bug     * fixed minor formatting issue

added GroupingBenchmark, fixes #190 (#224)          * possibility of using multiple aggregator functions for vertices and edges     * aggregator keys for vertex and edge aggregators will be set using command line parameter     * aggregator result keys for vertex and edge aggregators will be set using command line parameter     * added grouping.sh script and grouping_conf in dev-support/benchmark/grouping

added tlf gspan encoder, fixes #222 (#237)          * Initialized TLFGSpanEncoder (#222)          * More adjustments and additions due to generic id types and GSpanTLFGraphEncoder.          * Initialized TLFGSpanEncoder (#222)          * More adjustments and additions due to generic id types and GSpanTLFGraphEncoder.          * Added method to return all read TLFGraphs.          * Added tests for GSpanTLFGraphEncoder.          * Minor code style changes.

created Runner for PredictableTransactionsGenerator, fixes #227 (#230)          * created Runner for PredictableTransactionsGenerator (#227)          * minor changes in PredictableTransactionsGeneratorRunner (#227)

add module gradoop-benchmark          * added module gradoop-benchmark     * moved GroupingBenchmark to module gradoop-benchmark     * minor changes in grouping.conf and grouping.sh     * fixes #234, fixes #235, fixes #236          * minor changes in GroupingBenchmark (#234)          * GroupingBenchmark should now be able to work without EdgeGroupingKeys (#234)          * minor changes in grouping.conf and grouping.sh (#234)

added fsm benchmark workflow, fixes #187 (#241)          * added TransactionalFSMBenchmark (#187)          * added TransactionalFSMBenchmark (#187)          * renamed package          * removed duplicate (#187)          * fixed checkstyle (#187)     *added documentation in fsm_conf     *added documentation in fsm.sh          * added TransactionalFSMBenchmark (#187)          * added TransactionalFSMBenchmark (#187)          * renamed package          * removed duplicate (#187)          * fixed checkstyle (#187)     *added documentation in fsm_conf     *added documentation in fsm.sh          * added fsm scripts (#187)          * minur changes in fsm.conf and TransactionalFSMBenchmark(#187)          * added documentation to fsm-generator.sh (#187)
consider uvl and uel options in grouping.sh, fixes #243          * uvl (use vertex label) and uel (use edge label) are now added to the flink call
bugfix in TLF gSpan encoder, fixes #240          * fixed bug in TLF Encoder     * reduced runtime of gSpan miner test and ensured refinement is triggered
[doc] add disclaimer to README, fixes #248          * including trademark logos for Flink and HBase
TLF dataset duplicator and benchmark refactoring, fixes #214          * reduced runtime of gSpan miner test and ensured refinement is triggered     * data duplicator and benchmark refactoring
Bugfix in TLF Data Source, fixes #247 (#252)
Refactored FSM benchmark scripts, fixes #249 (#254)          * #249, yeast duplication works     * #249, predictable generation and benchmark work.
add EdgeList example for I/O, fixes #260 (#261)          * overloaded constructors for ImportEdge/-Vertex     * renamed fields in ImportEdge (sourceVertexId -> sourceId)
added Pokec I/O + Grouping example, fixes #225 (#268)
created edge list input, fixes #206 (#259)          * with support for vertex values
Removed wrong newline and corrected graph id increment, fixes #277 (#278)
Optimized graph creation from tlf text, fixes #275 (#279)
#273 null pointer in to transaction (#274)          * added test method     * fixes #273
distinction of directed and undirected DFS steps in FSM, fixes #255 (#281)          * FSMConfig factory method removed     * Separated directed and undirected DFS steps added
FSM bugfixes for undirected real world data sets, fixes #253  (#284)          * bugfix for empty graphs after preprocessing     * bugfix for wrong label comparison in preprocessing
Add Group Combine Strategy to Grouping operator (#287)          * added GroupCombine strategy for grouping, fixes #283     * updated documentation

Optional default value for aggregation (#289)          * removed need to specify default value for each aggregation     * added AggregateWithDefaultFunction to allow adding a user defined default value to AggregationFunctions and ApplyAggregationFunctions.     * fixes #231

#217 remove generics from gradoop-flink (#297)          removes the generics from gradoop-flink and uses the Pojo implementation instead. The persistent representation of the EPGM is still generic. Further changes are          * renamed gradoop-core to gradoop-common     * moved gradoop-algorithms to gradoop-flink     * moved gradoop-benchmark to gradoop-examples     * updated package names according to module names     * minor cleanups (poms, source, ...)

FSM based on a distributed cache, fixes #292, #303, #305, #307 (#310)          * reimplemented FSM based on distributed cache (#292)     * Frequent loss patterns example (#303)     * On read big decimal conversion for numerical property values (#305)     * DOT output bugfix for string ids starting with numerical characters (#307)
FSM with loop enrolling and quadratic pattern growth, fixes #320 (#321)          * removed hazelcast dependency

updated Flink dependency to 1.1.2, fixes #323 (#324)          * minor changes in classes including VertexMessagingFunction --> now including ScatterFunction     * minor changes in classes including VertexUpdateFunction --> now  including GatherFunction     * updated scripts using system variable for flink and hadoop paths
